about:
Ashutosh Pandey is a backend engineer with over 2 years of experience and has a strong foundation in Python, Flask and Django framework. He is proficient in building RESTful APIs and working with relational databases.


 Ashutosh is passionate about writing clean, modular and maintainable code, he enjoys solving complex backend challenges and likes to collaborate with frontend developers to create seamless web applications. Ashutosh is eager to further enhance his skills and contribute to innovative projects.
